name: Product/Item Description
notes: To describe a product or process in coded or free-form format

elements.name: Item Description Type
elements.notes: Code indicating the format of a description

elements.name: Product/Process Characteristic Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the general class of a product or process characteristic

elements.name: Association Qualifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

elements.name: Product Description Code
elements.notes: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

elements.name: Description
elements.notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

elements.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
elements.notes: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

elements.name: Source Subqualifier
elements.notes: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier
